mapper.select: SELECT mr.MedicalID as medicalId, mr.MedicalTime as medicalTime, mr.Diagnosis as diagnosis, mr.Medication as medication, mr.MedicalFee as medicalFee, mr.FollowUpAdvice as followUpAdvice FROM apptMedical am LEFT JOIN medicalRecord mr ON am.MedicalID = mr.MedicalID WHERE am.ApptID = #{apptId}
SELECT MedicalID FROM apptMedical WHERE ApptID = #{apptId} LIMIT 1
